title.rendered: Program Evaluation Finds LAWS Helps Bridge Gap to Legal Education

content.rendered:
A 2021 study examined LAWS’ ability to meet its goals and objectives.  The data overwhelmingly showed that LAWS is connected to greater improvement in grades and access to post-secondary education.

  • LAWS students miss 30% fewer days per year
  • LAWS students’ average marks are 12% higher than those of other students in parallel courses
  • LAWS graduates enrolled in university 47% more frequently than other TDSB students in the same school

LAWS Evaluation Executive Summary 2021
